main.name: Tassiana Lamatina
main.description: Hi, I'm a full-stack software engineer based in Los Angeles. Check out my ever-growing portfolio
main.bio: I am a Software Engineer with experience in management and multi-language public speaking. I am passionate about clean, efficient code and the quality of work I provide. I utilize my background in customer service as a foundation in everything I do, always keeping the end-user in mind. My tools are Javascript, HTML, CSS, Node.js, Sequelize, React, PostgreSQL, MongoDB and RESTful JSON routing.
main.contactmessage: Get a hold of me here:

resume.skillitems: •  JavaScript  •  HTML  •  Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)  •  Python  •  React   •  Node.js  •  Redux  •  PostgreSQL  •  Flask  •  Sequelize  •  Express.js  •  Object-Relational Mapping (ORM)  •  ODM  •  Business Operations  •  RESTful Routing JSON  •

projects.title: Best Buy Deals
projects.category: Full-stack application that allows users to search special deals within the Best Buy API.
projects.about: RESTful API fetch calls to an Express/Node.js backend that handles all CRUD operations. Backend routes tested using Postman. Layout made with HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap and Tailwind.
